      • A

        public static final int A
        The note value indicating an A
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • A$

        public static final int A$
        The note value indicating an A#. The value is determined by the number of half-steps that the note is up from A.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getValFromLetter

        public int getValFromLetter(java.lang.String letter)
        Parameters:
        letter - The letter name to be used.
        Returns:
        The half-step note value of a natural note with the given letter name.

        public Interval getInterval(Note other)
        Parameters:
        other - The other note to be compared
        Returns:
        The interval between this note and other
